name: BabyPhone Animals Music
description:
Baby Phone Musical game is an educational and entertaining game of early preschool. Playing with telephone he can easily learn 123(numbers),animals sounds and nursery rhymes.Baby Phone is the best free apps for kids or toddlers who love to play with their parents' mobile phones.

Generally baby want to play with cellphone all the time, then you can use this game to make your phone into a colorful baby phone with cute graphics and lots of fantastic animals voice. Baby phone music game suits for whole family including parents and babies of all ages.

Phone contain classic keypad with numbers, animal and piano keypad with hilarious sounds, when you dials a number sounds will be as per chosen keypad voice.press any numbers to hear sound and call to a number and talk with animals it will Keeps him visually stimulated and engaged.

your child will love these educational baby phone games with animals buttons that children can touch to hear the sound. Animal sounds include horse, elephant, cat, dog and many more farm animals.if you want to call a particular animal to hear their particular sounds, get a numbers from animal contact book and dial numbers to talk with animals.

Features of the Baby Phone:
- 3 type of keypads (Number,Animal,Piano)
- colorful animals and phone designs
- 18 cute animated animals for call
- Record your own singing and play it back
- Great sound effects
- Entertain your baby, kids, toddlers for hours
- Numbers 0 to 9
- Lots of pre-bundled Nursery Rhymes

For more fun, have a look at our other fun games for babies and children.
Baby phone musical stimulation produces great benefits as the sense of hearing, your baby will surly love baby phone,Please write a short comment about our game and let us know!
